page.title: 20BRADMORE VILLAGE
page.content: This small village of about 500 residences is three miles from { {Ruddington.}It has no shops and is very quiet.Most people who live there have bought a house to live in the village although they work in { {Nottingham }or {Loughborough.}The lack of facilities does not bother the people I interviewed as they have cars and mainly shop in{Ruddington }or at the supermarket {ASDA}in{West {Bridgford}and in{Nottingham }for clothes. People chose to live in {Bradmore } because they wanted a quiet life and the lack of a pub meant there would be no traffic problems. They are willing to transport their children to school, the library and to clubs. This year a plaque has been put on a wall to commemorate the {Morris {Dancers} who still come once a year.
